00028 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00029 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00030 from PyQt4.uic import *
00031 #import options
00032 from Koo.Common import Common
00033 import ServerConfigurationDialog
00034 
00035 (LoginDialogUi, LoginDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('login.ui') )
00036 
00037 ## @brief The LoginDialog class shows a Dialog for logging into OpenObject server.
00038 #
00039 # The dialog will send the accept() signal if the user accepted or reject() if she
00040 # cancelled it or didn't provide a valid server. If accept() was sent, two properties
00041 # 'url' and 'databaseName' contain the information introduced by the user.
00042 class LoginDialog( QDialog, LoginDialogUi ):
00043         defaultHost = ''
00044         defaultPort = 0
00045         defaultProtocol = ''
00046         defaultUserName = ''
00047 
00048         def __init__(self, parent=None ):
00049                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00050                 LoginDialogUi.__init__(self)
00051                 self.setupUi( self )
00052 
00053                 self.databaseName = ''
00054                 self.connect(self.pushCancel,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.slotCancel )
00055                 self.connect(self.pushAccept,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.slotAccept )
00056                 self.connect(self.pushChange,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.slotChange )
00057                 self.init()
00058         
00059         def setDatabaseName( self, name ):
00060                 self.databaseName = name
00061 
00062         def init(self):
00063                 uid = 0
00064                 self.uiNoConnection.hide()
00065                 host = LoginDialog.defaultHost
00066                 port = LoginDialog.defaultPort
00067                 protocol = LoginDialog.defaultProtocol
00068                 url = '%s%s:%s' % (protocol, host, port)
00069                 self.uiServer.setText( url )
00070                 self.uiUserName.setText( LoginDialog.defaultUserName )
00071                 res = self.refreshList()
00072 
00073         def refreshList(self):
00074                 res = ServerConfigurationDialog.refreshDatabaseList(self.uiDatabase, str( self.uiServer.text() ), self.databaseName )
00075                 if res == -1:
00076                         self.uiNoConnection.setText('<b>'+_('Could not connect to server !')+'</b>')
00077                         self.uiNoConnection.show()
00078                         self.uiDatabase.hide()
00079                         self.pushAccept.setEnabled(False)
00080                 elif res==0:
00081                         self.uiNoConnection.setText('<b>'+_('No database found, you must create one !')+'</b>')
00082                         self.uiNoConnection.show()
00083                         self.uiDatabase.hide()
00084                         self.pushAccept.setEnabled(False)
00085                 else:
00086                         self.uiNoConnection.hide()
00087                         self.uiDatabase.show()
00088                         self.pushAccept.setEnabled(True)
00089                 return res
00090 
00091         def slotChange(self):
00092                 dialog = ServerConfigurationDialog.ServerConfigurationDialog( self )
00093                 dialog.setDefault( str( self.uiServer.text() ) )
00094                 dialog.exec_()
00095                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00096                 self.uiServer.setText( dialog.url )
00097                 self.refreshList()
00098                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00099 
00100         def slotAccept( self ):
00101                 m = QUrl( self.uiServer.text() )
00102                 m.setUserName( self.uiUserName.text() )
00103                 m.setPassword( self.uiPassword.text() )
00104                 if m.isValid(): 
00105                         self.url = unicode( m.toString() )
00106                         self.databaseName = unicode( self.uiDatabase.currentText() )
00107                         self.accept()
00108                 else:
00109                         self.reject()
00110 
00111         def slotCancel(self):
00112                 self.reject()
00113
